Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class ClientMessanger

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.ClientMessanger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, ObserverView
public class ClientMessanger extends Object implements ObserverView, Observer
Gets inputs from the View and notifies the view and sends them as messages Also notifies the View that a certain message has arrived

    • chooseId

      public void chooseId(int id, boolean choice, int index, boolean none)
      Sends a Character Card's effect which involves moving a certain student
      Specified by:
      chooseId in interface ObserverView
      Parameters:
      id - of the student to move
      choice - true for herald and curator effect, otherwise false
      index - for the effect of the Acrobat Card
      none - boolean used to finish the effect for the Acrobat Card (it can lasts up to 3 times)
